title: The Pieces Around Them Change, but Houston’s Core Sets the Tone
description: Jose Altuve, Yuli Gurriel and Alex Bregman have reached the A.L.C.S. in six straight seasons. Through triumph and scandal, they have taught a rotating cast of teammates how to win.
dc:creator: Scott Miller

media:content.media:description: Houston’s infield is led by a core of Jose Altuve, Alex Bregman and Yuli Gurriel. Younger stars, including Jeremy Peña follow their example.
